account.delete-account-header: Kuak password kon kithaki dir aputar akount kon
account.delete-account-message: Iputayong akaunt kon, nibongokini nabo, iputae ngakuroon daang.
account.delete-fail: Eeyei ibere aroner, ang'ere akaunt kon akiputar.
account.delete-success: Eputar akaunt kon pii, topudoo tokona.

connection.error-retry: Eeyei ebere aruner, ithaki abongokin naboo?

consent-question.answer:
Ethoma/eiraa nikokinio ng'akirokan iwoiyo anianyokon. Ayeni atamar ethakio kutumai ng'akirokan sodi ataanyunia aking'arakinio aa ng'aropia.

Ayeni tangai iwolikinete ng'akirokan.

aakitap "achamu ayong" athak yong alomar naking'arakinio aa ng'aropia.

Aakitap "ager ayong" nathakia ayong alomar naking'arakinio.
consent-question.question:
Taanyuneia akilipa aking'arakinio nanga ethakitae tocham loger lowuiyere ng'akiro kon.

Kelipit kisoma or topupok loger lokuwuikinere ng'akiro kon.

create-account.create-password-explanation: Tosubak a password a ng'anambai ngoomwon.
create-account.introduction: Tosubakinia akaunt kon ithakitae kuwap ng'irotin lo.
create-account.unequal-passwords: Password ni ithubak iyong nikwaan, tobong'ok.
create-account.username-not-unique: Ekiro lo ipiak iyong nigogon, tobongok.
create-account.username-password: Kiwak ng'irora kon daang' tosubak password.

enroll-in-program.introduction-information: Taanyuneia aking'arakinio nianyokon ee rot alo ichaakina echamit ipotori ng'akiro naarai nakon.
enroll-in-program.please-confirm: Kop ne eyeia ng'akiro kon. Kitheme tatap temea.

inclusion-status.creating: Kiinak iyong sua ng'akiro niitemokino akiolikin kitheunio iyong anaking'arakinio kana.
inclusion-status.inclusion-status-negative: Terimakinae thua kotere kithaki alimokin iyong atamar nipedori anyuun aking'arakinio naga. Keya ni nithaki akingita kingitae thua.
inclusion-status.notify: Kitaanyuni iyong kiwankitae iyong naking'akino na.

login-account.incorrect-credentials: Kiwaakini ng'irora kon daang ka password nikiyeno. Tobongok nabo.
login-account.introduction: Taanyuneia alomar nakaunt kon, ithaki kipiak ng'irora kon daang kaa password tolumarie tooma.

registration-summary.no-validation-conclusion:
Niajok. Arumur aking'iro kon tokana.

Iyanyuni SMS/WhatsApp tokana ana namba a diit aniputuni iyong kilimokinit aking'iro kon.

Kilimokinio iyong kiyanyunit alotooma ng'irwa ng'itomon ka ngoomon.

Ikoi lo ekithid tokona.

select-fsp.introduction: Tolimu eger lo ithakia aking'arakinio kitheun iyong ana kigero kana.

select-program.introduction: Idimit akitumiar a app na akilipunea aking'arakinio. Arimatoi tetheu alo kop kane.
select-program.no-published-programs: Emamam tokana ibore eyei, tobongu nege achakwar.

set-notification-number.conclusion-skipped: Nimekina iyong a namba nikithuroria iyong. Iliwor ilomari tomaa a app na tanyunea ng'akiro.
set-notification-number.conclusion-submitted: Niajokon. Kitaanyuni ekoi tokana ana namba kana: {{phone}}
set-notification-number.input-label: A namba a diit kon imorikina ka namba a kop yok. Ikwanikin kona {{phoneNumberExample}}
set-notification-number.introduction2: Kitumiari naga akiyaanyun iyong nkoyo ka kwar nidimia taa aking'arakino.
set-notification-number.introduction3: Ani pe kiwak iyong a namba kon ewori ilomari toma na app na tanyunea nkoiyo.
set-notification-number.introduction4: Alidaun aking'arakino na eputata a namba kon.

validation.phone-number: Nechoikina thua a namba gina, kitenea tobongok nabo.

signup-signin.introduction: Taanyuna akilipa aking'arakino naga, eshamit etigit akaunt ori tothubak akaunt kitumia nagorot thek.

validation.date: Kwani iwakina iyong ng'irwa lokidounere nejok. Ejok iwakini kona '31-12-1970'. Ethekin a kwar, elep ke ekaru.
validation.generic-error: Nikidumit asubakin ng'akiro niwak iyong. Kitheme tobongok.
validation.number: Ng'akiro niwak iyong echamit erai ng'anambai. Tobongok nabo.
validation.phone-number: Nikidumit ayenun a namba na. Tobongok nabo.
validation.required: Ithakio tatash ibere niking'istae. Tobongok nabo.
